H0.text: Rhinitis is inflammation of the mucus membranes of what. Throat

H1.text: Rhinitis is inflammation of the mucus membranes of what. Larynx

H2.text: Rhinitis is inflammation of the mucus membranes of what. Trachea

H3.text: Rhinitis is inflammation of the mucus membranes of what. Nose

A4.text: Rhinitis, also known as coryza, is irritation and inflammation of the mucous membrane inside the nose.
